entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers in the evening. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:53 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
